Title: Implements "Cassie's law"
Summary: Implements "Cassie's law" which provides a private right of action for crime victims against persons or private entities who suppress evidence of a crime in exchange for monetary compensation.
LawCode: Add Art 5 Title 18 ยง5-1801, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to implementing the "Cassie's law"
